Name: Apicurio
Text: Woah! Where'd he get off to?! I can't have much of an after battle dialogue if he's gone . . .

Name: Apicurio
Text: Well, at the very least, I got him to back off. No more draining the life of the weak, diseased, and helpless!

Name: Apicurio
Text: He might not be gone for good, but I'll be here to stop him if he pops up again!
